dict.string: LifeTunes requires your location to automatically generate location-specific playlists that match your environment (for example, calming music when you're in a park, or energetic tracks when you're at the gym) and to create a personalized mood map by recording where you log your emotions, helping you identify which places positively or negatively affect your wellbeing.

LifeTunes sends you daily wellness reminders and motivational challenges to help maintain your mental health routine. For example, you'll receive a gentle reminder at 7 PM to log your mood or a motivational quote to start your day.
